content:
Hi Anand, I've thoroughly reviewed FameExpress.com. I understand the space and how to position the service within the target subreddits (r/AmazonSeller, r/FulfillmentByAmazon, etc.) and LinkedIn groups. I can definitely handle the community engagement and lead identification for the 8-week campaign.

Regarding payment, we accept CashApp ($freedomsfaction), PayPal (@noizce), or SOL/USDC to 2btNwpfVpeQrtmgatvZPy5NG4YyKXtmvm11D1QFEJxaY.

Let me know if you have any other questions before we kick this off!
